LanguageData.ATR_ConnectedSkyMindAttacked.stages.0.de: A SkyMind network I connected to was breached! I don't feel safe.
LanguageData.ATR_AttackedViaSkyMind.stages.0.label: Directly hacked
LanguageData.ATR_AttackedViaSkyMind.stages.0.descript: I was mentally assaulted through a breach in a SkyMind network I connected to! I feel violated - how could I have trusted it to be safe?
LanguageData.ATR_TrolledViaSkyMind.stages.0.label: Trolled
LanguageData.ATR_TrolledViaSkyMind.stages.0.descripti: Hackers went far out of their way to breach the SkyMind network just to hurt and insult me! Who has the audacity to do such a thing - and why couldn't we stop it?
LanguageData.ATR_SurrogatePuppetThought.stages.0.desc: An intelligent being has been transformed by the colony into a puppet. They may look the same, but now there is no intelligence. We killed them and turned their body into a soulless husk.
